data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Numerous colleges, universities and companies offer business plan competitions open to students from all institutions. Browse ____ Internet ____ check ____ entrepreneurship ____ sites ____ more ____. If ____ school ____ a ____ plan ____, ____ involved. Not only do you get a chance to win some hard cash for your business, you have a motive to get your business plan written, and probably some guidelines to help you make it work.
data.partBlankContent: Numerous colleges, universities and companies offer business plan competitions open to students from all institutions. Browse t__ Internet a__ check o__ entrepreneurship w__ sites f__ more reso_____. If yo__ school ru__ a busi____ plan compe______, g__ involved. data.fullContent: Numerous colleges, universities and companies offer business plan competitions open to students from all institutions. Browse the Internet and check out entrepreneurship web sites for more resources. If your school runs a business plan competition, get involved. Not only do you get a chance to win some hard cash for your business, you have a motive to get your business plan written, and probably some guidelines to help you make it work.
data.answer: 许多学院、大学和公司向所有机构的学生开放商业计划竞赛。浏览互联网，查看创业网站以获取更多资源。如果你的学校正在举办一场商业计划竞赛，那就参加吧。你不仅有机会为你的生意赢得一些现金，你有动机去写你的商业计划，可能还有一些指导方针来帮助你实现它。
